name: Gravity Calls
description:
We bring you the ultimate platformer, with no platforms, no right or left, only the planets and thrusts.  Plan your course across the stars to finally meet the goal .

You don't have direction control, so what use the planet's gravity field. 

Art,: me (mostly google )  and coralmonkey( He made two planets! )

Level design: me and gksudershan( you had amazing ideas, time was a bit short)

Coding : me

Music: Zuchis (Amazing work)  (https://itch.io/profile/moreesh)

First ever game, but hope y'all enjoy( I know its a bit hard) ( but you have infinite tries)

Keys are check points,  and you can pause to guess the trajectory
